data.name: Hush Hush - Only Your Love Can Save Them Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: Rock out to your fave music on the Hush Hush original soundtrack, composed by Scarlett Moon Studios and various artists. This OST includes all 49 unique tracks from the game in mp3 format.
data.about_the_game: Rock out to your fave music on the Hush Hush original soundtrack, composed by Scarlett Moon Studios and various artists. This OST includes all 49 unique tracks from the game in mp3 format.
data.short_description: Music from the game Hush Hush!
